name: lmpca-website
description: Light Mission Pentecostal Church of Atlanta Website with Donation Processing

scripts.test-stripe: node -e "console.log('Testing Stripe configuration...'); require('dotenv').config(); const stripe = require('stripe')(process.env.STRIPE_SECRET_KEY); stripe.balance.retrieve().then(balance => console.log('✅ Stripe connection successful!', balance)).catch(err => console.error('❌ Stripe connection failed:', err.message));"
scripts.test-email: node -e "require('./utils/email').testEmailConfig().then(result => console.log(result ? '✅ Email configuration valid' : '❌ Email configuration failed'));"
scripts.create-db: node -e "require('./database/init').initDatabase().then(() => console.log('✅ Database initialized')).catch(err => console.error('❌ Database error:', err));"

author: LMPCA
